name.en: Electronic database of legal entities and branches (Krygyzstan) TIN
name.local: Юридикалык жактардын, филиалдардын электрондук базасы ИНН

description.en: The Ministry of Justice of the Republic of Kyrgyz maintains the register of legal entities. This list references Taxpayer Identification Numbers (TIN)

access.onlineAccessDetails:
Company can be searched by its name ('наименование'), registration number ('Рег. №'), tax number ('ИНН'), OKPO code ('Код ОКПО', assigned to each legal entity for statistics purposes). Additional search criteria exist for company status ('Статус'), registration date ('Дата') etc.  

Search is free-of-charge, no English interface.
access.guidanceOnLocatingIds: To find a company's TIN you will need to know one of company name ('наименование'), registration number ('Рег. №'), OKPO code (Код ОКПО). A search for one of these will return a link to the full company details, which includes the TIN
